import React, { useState } from 'react' import Hamburger from '../../assets/Hamburger/Hamburger' import showControl from '../../assets/showControl/showControl' import Container from '../Container/Container' import LoginMenu from '../LoginMenu/LoginMenu' import Navbar from '../Navbar/Navbar' import NavbarContainer from '../Navbar/NavbarContainer' import user from '../../images/user.svg' type TProps = { setIsNavbarOpen: (isNavbarOpen: boolean) => void isNavbarOpen: boolean logoText: string isLoginMenuOpen: boolean setIsLoginMenuOpen: (isLoginMenuOpen: boolean) => void } const Header: React.FC = React.memo(({setIsNavbarOpen, isNavbarOpen, logoText, isLoginMenuOpen, setIsLoginMenuOpen}) => { return (
{logoText}
{showControl((
), isLoginMenuOpen)} {showControl((
), isNavbarOpen)}
) }) export default Header
